help.general: Sync with EGS in case you have a working installation of the Epic Games Store elsewhere and want to import your games to avoid downloading them again.

other.part3: to be called before launching the game;
other.part6: to be called after the launch command, for instance:
other.part7: to skip the launcher in some games, etc.

sync.part1: Heroic tries to guess the right save folder and this will work on the majority of cases. In case the folder is wrong, use the override box to change it.
sync.part2: In case you change the prefix folder for Wine or Proton, you will need to check the path again since Proton uses a different prefix (/pfx) and username (steamuser). So you can simple erase the current path get out of the sync settings page and get back again for Heroic to guess the folder one more time with the right prefix.
sync.part3: Manual Sync: Choose Download to download the games saves stored on the Cloud. Upload to upload the local ones to the cloud. Force Download and Force Upload will ignore the version that is locally or on the cloud.
sync.part4: Sync Saves Automatically will sync the saves every time you Start a Game and after finishing playing.

wine.part1: Heroic searches for versions of Wine, Proton, and CrossOver in the following folders:
wine.part2: For other places, use a symbolic link to one of these folders

gameargs.title: Game Arguments (To run after the command):

setting.addgamestostartmenu: Add games to start menu automatically
setting.alt-legendary-bin: Choose an Alternative Legendary Binary  (needs restart)
setting.change-target-exe: Select an alternative EXE to run
setting.defaultWinePrefix: Set Folder for new Wine Prefixes
setting.enableFSRHack: Enable FSR Hack (Wine version needs to support it)
setting.gamemode: Use GameMode (Feral Game Mode needs to be installed)
setting.mangohud: Enable Mangohud (Mangohud needs to be installed)
setting.maxworkers: Maximum Number of Workers when downloading

savefolder.placeholder: Select the exact save games folder
savefolder.title: Override Cloud Sync Save folder

userselector.logout_confirmation: Are you sure you want to logout?
